help.file_question: How do I add audio files?
help.file_text:
Put your audio files into the '{AUDIO_PATH}' folder.
The following file formats are supported: mp3, ogg, wav.
help.icon_question: How do I change the icons?

exit.question: You need to restart to apply changes to audio devices. Do you want to exit now?
error.audio_devices: An error occurred. Audio device selection reset to default.
